meeting_info.location: Central Library – Classroom A (6th Floor) and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the July 16, 2024 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for CF Hawn Apartments
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to AMTEX CF Hawn Fund, LP for financing a multifamily residential rental development.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for Westmoreland Townhomes
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to Westmoreland Townhomes Limited Partnership.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for Torrington Davis
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to a limited liability company created by JPI Affordable Acquisition, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for Torrington Forest
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to a limited liability company created by JPI Affordable Acquisition, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for 2929 Wycliff
agenda_items.description: Resolutions for a multifamily residential development to be located at 2929 Wycliff Avenue.

agenda_items.title: Resolution Regarding The Ridge at Loop 12
agenda_items.description: Resolution regarding participation in the financing of The Ridge at Loop 12.

agenda_items.title: Establishment of a Credit Card Account
agenda_items.description: Resolution regarding the establishment of a credit card account for the Corporation with Origin Bank.

agenda_items.title: Dallas HFC Meeting Schedule
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve the Dallas HFC September 2024 to December 2025 meeting schedule.

agenda_items.title: DHFC Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report for the six-month period ending on June 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Corporation’s Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of August 5, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Presentation by Housing Connector
agenda_items.description: Presentation regarding the services provided by Housing Connector.

financial_items.description: Loan to AMTEX CF Hawn Fund, LP for CF Hawn Apartments
Loan to Westmoreland Townhomes Limited Partnership
Loan to JPI Affordable Acquisition, LLC for Torrington Davis
